page.title: 04LORD COURTENAY'S FARM
page.content: {Lord Courtenay's}farm is a very big one.It has roughly 3700 acres of land. 1200 acres of land are crops. Barley, potatoes, corn,wheat,swede and peas are grown.Of course machinery is also on the farm.Stile Farm has 8 tractors, a combine harvester,rollers,balers and fertiliser spreaders. A lot of the land is used for animals.They have,mostly, South Devon cows and sheep.Some of the cows are used for beef and the sheep are sheared in the middle of May. They have 5 workers,two of which are only part time. Farmers have trouble with rabbits and mice. Rats come from the river and crows eat the crops. In the winter animals and crops are put in barns, cattle eat silage, barley and hay,sheep eat hay,silage and root crops.The E.E.C has affected their farm,particularly increased paperwork.
